text: phir jab usase niraash ho gaye, to ekaant mein hokar praamarsh karane lage. unake bade ne kahaah kya tum nahin jaanate ki tumhaare pita ne tumase allaah ko saakshee banaakar drdh vachan liya tha? aur isase pahale jo aparaadh tumane yoosuph ke baare mein kiya hai? to main is dharatee (misr) se nahin jaoonga, jab tak mujhe mere pita anumati na de den athava allaah mere lie nirnay na kar de aur vahee sabase achchha nirnay karane vaala hai
